definition: to talk endlessly/talking of anything under the sun
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Always thought that to understand a lot of their own, chat all day, pretend to be thou.
sentences.chinese: 总以为自己懂很多，整天谈天说地，自命清高。

sentences.english: The middle octagonal court, there are a few people chatting.
sentences.chinese: 中间的八角庭里有几个人在谈天说地。

sentences.english: We crouched on the sofa, shooting the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 我们蜷在沙发里谈天说地。

sentences.english: We are together, in your house, talk of everything under the sun, boasting a tiger.
sentences.chinese: 我们在一起，在你的小屋里，谈天说地，吹牛打虎。

sentences.english: On the other side of the bar, a group of chutes were standing and chatting happily.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧的另一端，站著一群胖子，高兴地谈天说地。

sentences.english: Old people talks of everything below shade.
sentences.chinese: 老年人谈天说地树荫下。

sentences.english: As the movie came to an end the room filled with chatter.
sentences.chinese: 电影结束后，房间充满了谈天说地的闲聊。

sentences.english: I very much like talking to you and I consider you my new friend.
sentences.chinese: 我把你作为我的新朋友，非常希望能和你谈天说地。

definition: to chatter idly/to gossip/to boast or brag
to talk of the past and discuss the present (idiom)/to chat freely/to discuss everything
to talk cheerfully and wittily/to joke together
distant places/all over the country/(to talk) about this and that
variant of 閒談|闲谈[xian2 tan2]
see 天南地北[tian1 nan2 di4 bei3]
lit. knees pressed close/intimate/seated side by side/in close contact
